title.narrative: Promoting Access to Information Project in Brazil CSCF346

description.narrative: The promulgation and implementation of an access to information law in Brazil which public officials, civil society groups and representatives from poor communities in target areas are trained to use as a tool to empower citizens, advocate their respective interests and improve government transparency.

title.narrative: Improving livelihoods of poor small farmers Brazil CSCF375

description.narrative: To strengthen poor farmers' organisations and the general public and to raise awareness about The Food and Agricutural Organisation of the UN's treaty on Plant Genetic Resources and the right to save, use, exchange and sell their own seeds. And to campaign for its implementation and to develop agro-ecological practices which support the Farmers Right to seed.
